title: Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930–39
medium:
Medium: glass and jet beads, braiding
Technique: embroidery on plain weave
inscribed:
"Crotchet Beads
+ Black Braid
Hand Embr.
Black Jet
Beads+ Bugles"
description: Black fabric with embroidered floral spray motif worked in all black bugle and seed beads and braiding in knots and chain stitch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Couture Embroidery Sample, 1930–39. Medium: glass and jet beads, braiding
Technique: embroidery on plain weave. Gift of David Glickman. 1977-81-23.
